original_text:
He gives power to the faint,
    and to him who has no might he increases strength.
korean_text: 피곤한 자에게는 능력을 주시며 무능한 자에게는 힘을 더하시나니

sentences.original_text: He gives power to the faint
and to him who has no might he increases strength.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 힘이 없는 자에게 힘을 더해주십니다.
